name: Limbocore
description:
A short game prototype about exploring the limbo.

What is this place? I don't know. There are a few critters to talk to and an angel to play cards with.

You can use wasd and arrow keys to walk around, Z or left click to interact, X or right click to Button 2(Speed Text), and Q&E to rotate the camera. F toggles screen effects. And you can hold down escape to quit.

You could probably play this for about 15 minutes, I don't mind.

Using arachonteur's psychic swamp tileset.

Also using Jamie Rollo's MeshEdit.

And KaiClavier's Super Text Mesh.

Font is Silkscreen.

Music by rotseraph. (soundcloud) 

This game is a PROTOTYPE! If you would like to see more, let me know! Comment, share it, or if you're feeling extra frisky, donate! (And, get the deck of animated Major Arcana cards as well as some concept art as a donation bonus!)
